title: Help: ERD Commander+Win7installer+Hiren 14+Kaspersky Rescue on a bootable USB

forumNotes.author: armin3000
forumNotes.content:
Hi, How can I have all of these bootable tools on a single Bootable USB: I have their bootable ISOs but I couldn't find a tool than support all of them. I have tried **Yumi** , **XBoot** , **SARDU** . - ERD Commander 5 (XP) - ERD Commander 6.5 x86/x64 (7) - Kaspersky Rescue 10 - Hiren's boot CD 14 (all tools, (Dos tools+XP Live) - Windows 7 Installer Please note that I need all of them. Some one told me that the ERD is a commercial tools so they won't support in their software! But assume that I have bought ERD commanders.
I'm not expert in writing scripts and boot codes and I prefer to use a tools with GUI or follow a simple instruction. Yumi was not too bad but it doesn't support hiren's 14 xp live. Sardu had many problems. xboot didn't have many tools. ![:dubbio:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/dubbio.gif) ![:cold:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cold.gif)
